title: Type - Warrant Trigger
description: Type representation of a warrant's exercise rights into stock class upon an event (such as holder election or Change of Control)

trigger_id.description: Id for this exercise trigger, unique within list of WarrantTriggers in parent warrant issuance's `exercise_triggers` field.

nickname.description: Human-friendly nickname to describe the exercise right (e.g. Exercisable Upon Change of Control)

trigger_condition.description: If applicable, Legal language describing what conditions must be satisfied for the exercise to take place (ideally, this should be excerpted from the instrument where possible)

trigger_type.description: When the trigger condition is met, is the exercise automatic or elective

trigger_date.description: What is the date of the trigger (if applicable for this trigger)

conversion_right.description: When the conditions of the trigger are met, how does the convertible convert?
